name: Flamingo Island
description:
Inflatable flamingo take on ice curling!!!

It's a bit rough but worth playing just for the original good-vibes soundtrack.  (Thanks @TunaShampoo for the music and sounds)

Instructions

  • Puncture the inflatable flamingos to propell them forwards!!
  • Play with a friend, try to get as close to the island as possible and knock your opponent's flamingos away.
  • Closest to the island wins.

How close can you get? Share in the comments!

(didn't have chance to actually implement scoring system or player colours.  You'll have to use your imagination sorry!!!)
